on reading compounds: 擲弾筒【テキダントウ】grenade launcher
窓外投擲【ソウガイトウテキ】defenestration (throwing something or somebody out the window)
抛擲【ホウテキ】abandoning, giving up, quitting
打擲【チョウチャク】thrashing, beating
kun reading compounds: 殴る【なぐる】to strike, to hit, to beat, to punch
投げ打つ【なげうつ】to abandon, to throw away, to fling away
